text: @RandPaul You should be worrying about the UNIMAGINABLE NUMBER OF DEATHS TO AMERICANS, due to COVID19 VIRUS, that your moronic, useless leader has IGNORED and “thrown under the bus” for his “greater political glory!” How’s your neighbor, btw?🤔🤬😡
